articles.title: Europe digests inflation; oil prices rebound - Investing.com
articles.description: Europe digests inflation; oil prices rebound
articles.content:
Investing.com -- European stocks traded in mixed fashion on Friday as investors digested the latest inflation figures for the eurozone.
